OrgName: Lexis Managed Technology Services, a business of LexisNexis Legal & Professional, a division of Reed Elsevier Inc.
activities: Lexis Managed Technology Services receives personal information from its customers and its affiliates’ customers to provide data management services, including data hosting and managed network services, and related customer support and communications and to support and improve its services and processes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed customer data
